Students are not required to purchase any materials for the course, as we will rely upon freely available information sources. But here are some useful resources that you might consult during and after the course.

<br>

## Books

Heard SB. 2016. [*The Scientist’s Guide to Writing*](https://scientistseessquirrel.wordpress.com/the-scientists-guide-to-writing/). Princeton University Press.

Zinsser W. 2016. [*On Writing Well*](https://www.harpercollins.com/products/on-writing-well-william-zinsser?variant=32118081159202). HarperCollins.


<br>

## Papers
